uk.ac.ed.epcc.webapp.editors.xml

Interface XMLTargetFactory

  • All Superinterfaces:
    Contexed
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    XMLOverlay

    public interface XMLTargetFactory
extends Contexed
    Interface to locate an XMLTarget based on a location path. The number of path elements used to identify the document and the number that represent a position within the document is implementation dependent. The first element of the path should always be the tag used to to create the XMLTargetFactory from the AppContext.makeObject(Class, String) call. This way paths are unique and can be used to locate the correct factory.
    Author:
    spb
